msbt.message: Never saw the point of makin' some kinda plan for the comin' year.Been around long enough to know there ain't no plannin' for all the wild curves life has in store for you.
Some people give gifts at the start of a new year Nice idea, I reckon.Wonder how they choose what to give? What gift says ""?
Gonna start by fixin' myself a big pot of my new-year stew!Ain't exactly a good cook, but stew's easy enough to make, and there's always leftovers!
So , set any goals for yourself for the comin' year?Don't really have any of my own. Besides cuttin' back on sweets

Guess it's time we switched over to a new calendar It's hard, pickin' a theme worth lookin' at all year. Do I want somethin' with twelve months of scenery, or one that's got a joke for every new month?
